content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From EPAM’s strong roots in engineering excellence, EPAM’s SAP CX practice grew out of existing Hybris and SAP implementers tapping into EPAM’s deep technical talent. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In time, EPAM grew to offer world class SAP CX delivery capabilities as a trusted SAP CX expert, covering all areas of digital transformation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":92697,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f2ebe3b8-3907-4fb7-ad45-5a3a4bab36da/History.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f2ebe3b8-3907-4fb7-ad45-5a3a4bab36da/History.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"History.PNG\",\"name\":\"History.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f2ebe3b8-3907-4fb7-ad45-5a3a4bab36da\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.02783203125,\"height\":536.8160401318917},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
